content.raw: For the record, I do agree in principle that `SetPosition` functions *shouldn't* zero out velocity, but since it's already a behavior which user code may easily be depending on, it could be harmful to change the default behavior while keeping the API the same. Users whose code suddenly starts to fail after an upgrade would be lost as to why it's suddenly failing.
